long_description: Lightweight and multifunctional, the large REI Campware cookset is treated with Teflon(R) Classic nonstick coating for superior scratch resistance. Aluminum pots and pans distribute heat beautifully, satisfying even the fussiest camp chefs. Backpackers, too, enjoy the aluminum construction for its significant weight savings compared to stainless steel. Teflon Classic nonstick cooking surfaces speed cleanup easily along. Double-rolled rims increase stiffness and durability, so plan to keep these pots and pans for years of use. Special gripper hooks to exterior brackets on the frypans and the small 2.5 qt. pot, minimizing scratching. Large 4.7 liter (5 qt.) pot features a bale handle; it conveniently stows away when nested with other pieces. Set includes a 4.7 liter (5 qt.) pot, 3.2 liter (3.4 qt.) pot, 8.9 in. frypan/lid, 9.75 in. frypan/lid, two camp towels, pot gripper and mesh storage bag. Camp towels help protect nonstick finish when pots nest.
short_description: Lightweight and multifunctional, the large REI Campware cookset is treated with Teflon(R) Classic nonstick coating for superior scratch resistance.
